page.title: 03Ashbourne Shrove Football 2
page.content: The crowd begins to sing the{National {Anthem.}Then the{ball}is thrown up. Everybody gets pushed around.It gets hot and sweaty as people crowd together.You can not see very well because there are so many people.It is very frightening especially if you are at the back of the hug.You sometimes get squashed up to the wall.When everyone else begins to run we run too.There is alot of shouting and screaming.Sometimes funny things happen like a man was running with the {ball}he tripped over a stone and the went rolling out of his arms as he fell flat on his face.One man was also pushed into the river and swallowed alot of dirty water,he grew very ill. There are some sad things that happen too like a man got trampled on in the water he was ill for a while.Many people get{injured}at{Shrovetide.
